name: Multi-Scene, Multi-Save
description:
Creating storage in Gdevelop isn't easy. So my friend Lucky J helped me created a template that allows multiple save slots in a game with multiple scenes.

We're publicly publishing it so anyone else who wants to learn how to program those will have a guide.

There's programming on:

- Creating storage

- Saving storage via Checkpoints

- Respawn at checkpoints after dying or exiting the game

- Simple health state

- Scenes with more than on entrance and exits

- Fade between scene transition effect
